name: Nothing In A Bar
description:
Start with 'Nothing In A Bar'.

Description:

A slow-paced Dialogue/Action based first person-view game where you talk to a bartender and do actions.
Different actions lead to different outcomes, the game has NINE different endings, with each ending having its own Plot-twists & Effects.

Each Game-play session lasts for about 1-2 Minutes, Each action is made in such a way so that the player gets to enjoy the atmosphere & environment of the bar without actually controlling the player.

Personally, The "Get up & Check out the bottles closely" Action has the best ending. ( But not for the faint-hearted )
Game-play does get repetitive, but I request you to go through all the endings.

Controls:

Mouse to click dialogue box/action button.
No Keyboard input.

Use HEADPHONES for best audio experience.
All Audio From https://freesound.org/.
